Notice:
"This app uses Accessibility services."
Full Screen Display and Quick Ball gestures feature uses Accessibility services to allow users of all abilities to use phone more conveniently. These features are disabled by default, before you can enable them, you will be asked to permit Accessibility with very clear explanation.
